name: hyper/chip heroes
description:
IMPORTANT: the block you shoot on the same square as the player starts off which direction it will go in, each block must be placed with an arrow to keep the AI going before the timer ends, disregard the hearts, we had hazards but couldnt get them working properly.

when on the menu screen, hit SPACE to proceed

this game is incomplete, aside from trying to submit a game into this we wanted to use this jam to learn new (ok its not new) stuff. We used the Superpowers engine to do this as a couple people in our camp are learning Typescript. Aside from that we wanted to be able to work on the game at the same time in real time without Git or anything (not that the engine wouldve let us anyway haha).

The engine is cool and you can do a lot of interesting things with it, but the highlight is the collab tools. We basically developed this game in multiplayer mode, definitely give it a try if you have a team.

use A/D to move the player cursor left and right 

use E/Q to rotate pieces to be shot

press space to start the "placing" mechanic, release to place block once confident in your layout, hit ENTER key to start the antivirus on its path.
